overview:
Anindya Chakrabarty is the Founder and CEO of Tech Integrated which he started with 3 of his high-school friends from an Indian Airforce service quarter.

Chakrabarty is responsible for setting the overall direction and product strategy for Tech Integrated. He leads the design of Tech Integrated’s service and development of its core technology and infrastructure.

The idea behind Tech Integrated was to become the next revolutionary IT company , which would change the face of technology and modern IT.

Earlier in life , Chakrabarty developed an Open-Source website called Gizmo Universe which was focused on Tech freaks and Geeks.

On September 14th , Tech Integrated received a secure funding from Globals worth $500,000.

Chakrabarty was also recognized as the youngest certified web developer and was also named under the 30 most influential people on the web. His achievements also tagged him as the World’s Youngest CEO in 2011.
